DOC.detailed_description: Although FOLFIRINOX regimen recently present effective metastatic pancreatic cancer select patient good physical condition , still insufficient evidence regimen treat patient metastatic pancreatic cancer China . Since many tumor , different race may show different response regimen , design open , multicenter phase Ⅱ study evaluate efficacy safety mFOLFIRINOX first-line treatment metastatic pancreatic cancer China .
